about_the_game:
Racing Revolution is an exhilarating racing game that challenges players to master high-speed tracks in diverse seasonal environments. Whether you're burning rubber under the summer sun or navigating slick roads in the spring, every race pushes your driving skills to the limit. Experience intense competition against AI or real players in both single-player and multiplayer modes, with each track offering unique challenges and dynamic weather conditions that keep you on the edge of your seat.

Key Features:

Realistic Physics and Controls: Experience the thrill of racing with realistic vehicle physics that reward precision driving and skillful handling.

Time Trials and Leaderboards: Test your speed and aim for the top of the leaderboards in intense time trials, perfecting your lap times on each track.


Racing Revolution offers a perfect blend of arcade-style fun and skill-based racing, making it a must-play for racing enthusiasts of all levels. Are you ready to take on the challenge and dominate the track?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 or similar
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 5th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
